languages.text: "В-верно! А если Простор лишится навигаторского Дома, смута охватит не только миры и станции, неспособные существовать без зрячего Ока Навис Нобилите, но и флотилии Вольных Торговцев. Это затронет и вашу династию, {name} фон Валанциус. Так на чьей вы стороне?"

traits.locale_text: "В-верно! А если Коронус лишится навигаторского дома, смута охватит не только миры и станции, неспособные существовать без зрячего Ока Навис Нобилите, но и флотилии Вольных Торговцев. Это затронет и вашу династию, {name} фон Валанциус. Так на чьей вы стороне?"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"
languages.original_text: "В-верно! А если Простор лишится навигаторского Дома, смута охватит не только миры и станции, неспособные существовать без зрячего Ока Навис Нобилите, но и флотилии Вольных Торговцев. Это затронет и вашу династию, {name} фон Валанциус. Так на чьей вы стороне?"

traits.locale_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations which cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I ask you now: which side are you on?"

And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: 「お、仰るとおり！そんなことは許されない！自由開拓者、どうか説得を！コロヌス・エクスパンスが航宙士の家を失えば、航宙貴族の目なしには存在できない星々とステーションが混乱に呑み込まれますし、自由開拓者の艦隊は身動きが取れなくなります。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝も影響を受けるのですよ、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。さあ、伺いましょう。どちら側につくのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: 「お、仰るとおり！そんなことは許されない！自由開拓者、どうか説得を！コロヌス・エクスパンスが航宙士の家を失えば、航宙貴族の目なしには存在できない星々とステーションが混乱に呑み込まれますし、自由開拓者の艦隊は身動きが取れなくなります。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝も影響を受けるのですよ、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス。さあ、伺いましょう。どちら側につくのですか？」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: “是……是啊！如果科罗努斯扩区失去了一个导航者家族，这片星区所有世界与星站都会陷入动荡之中。如果失去了导航宗族的引导，行商浪人的舰队恐怕也不会好过，你的王朝也一样会受到影响，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。所以，我想问你，你到底站在哪边？”
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: “是……是啊！如果科罗努斯扩区失去了一个导航者家族，这片星区所有世界与星站都会陷入动荡之中。如果失去了导航宗族的引导，行商浪人的舰队恐怕也不会好过，你的王朝也一样会受到影响，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯。所以，我想问你，你准备站在哪边？”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: « Ou-oui, exactement ! Et si les Étendues de Koronus perdent une maison de navigateurs, les mondes et stations qui dépendent de la Navis Nobilite seront plongés dans la tourmente, de même que les flottes des libres-marchands. Votre dynastie ne sera pas épargnée, {name} von Valancius. Alors, je vous le demande : dans quel camp êtes-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: « Ou-oui, exactement ! Si les Étendues perdent une maison de navigateurs, les mondes et stations qui dépendent de la Navis Nobilite seront plongés dans la tourmente, de même que les flottes des libres-marchands. Votre dynastie ne sera pas épargnée, {name} von Valancius. Alors, je vous le demande : dans quel camp êtes-vous ? »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: «¡S-sí, en efecto! Y si la Extensión de Koronus pierde una casa de Navegantes, el caos devorará a los mundos y estaciones que no pueden existir sin el ojo vigía de la Navis Nobilite, y las flotas de los Comerciantes Independientes estarán igual de perdidas. Su dinastía también se verá afectada, {name} von Valancius. Con eso en mente, responda: ¿a quién apoya?».
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: «¡S-sí, en efecto! Y si la Extensión pierde una casa de Navegantes, el caos devorará a los mundos y estaciones que no pueden existir sin el ojo vigía de la Navis Nobilite, y las flotas de los Comerciantes Independientes estarán igual de perdidas. Su dinastía también se verá afectada, {name} von Valancius. Con eso en mente, responda: ¿a quién va a apoyar?».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "J-Ja, in der Tat! Und wenn die Koronus-Ausdehnung ein Navigatorenhaus verliert, werden Welten und Stationen ins Chaos gestürzt, die nicht ohne das sehende Auge der Navis Nobilite existieren können. Und den Flotten von Freihändlern wird es nicht besser ergehen. Auch Eure Dynastie wird die Auswirkungen zu spüren bekommen, {name} von Valancius. Daher frage ich Euch jetzt: Auf wessen Seite steht Ihr?"
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: "J-Ja, in der Tat! Und wenn die Ausdehnung ein Navigatorenhaus verliert, werden Welten und Stationen ins Chaos gestürzt, die nicht ohne das sehende Auge der Navis Nobilite existieren können. Und den Flotten von Freihändlern wird es nicht besser ergehen. Auch Eure Dynastie wird die Auswirkungen zu spüren bekommen, {name} von Valancius. Daher frage ich Euch jetzt: Auf wessen Seite schlagt Ihr Euch?"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader

languages.text: "E... Evet, aynen! Ayrıca Koronus Enginliği, Rotacı Hanelerinden birini kaybederse... Navis Nobilite'nin varlığına bel bağlayan dünya ve istasyonlarda ortalık karışır. Hakeza Hür Tacirlerin filolarında da... Bunun etkileri, sizin hanedanlığınıza da yansır {name} von Valancius. O yüzden şimdi size soruyorum: Kimin tarafındasınız?"
languages.original_text: "Y-yes, indeed! And if the Koronus Expanse loses a Navigator House, turmoil will engulf worlds and stations that cannot exist without the seeing eye of the Navis Nobilite, and Rogue Traders' fleets will fare no better. Your dynasty too will feel the effects, {name} von Valancius. So I am asking you now: whose side are you on?"

traits.locale_text: "E... Evet, aynen! Ayrıca Koronus Enginliği, Rotacı Hanelerinden birini kaybederse; Navis Nobilite'nin gözü altında olmaksızın var olamayacak dünyalarla istasyonlarda ortalık karışır... Hakeza Hür Tacirlerin filolarında da. Bunun etkileri, sizin hanedanlığınıza da yansır {name} von Valancius. O yüzden şimdi size soruyorum: Siz kimin tarafındasınız?"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviTraditionalistLeader
